import axios from "axios"; import { useParams,} from "react-router-dom"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import MyNavbar from "../../components/navbar/MyNavbar"; import { Container, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import { BsPencilSquare } from "react-icons/bs"; import { BiTimeFive, BiCategoryAlt} from "react-icons/bi"; function Article(){ const articleId =useParams().articleId; const [articleData, setArticleData] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:8000/articles/${articleId}`) .then (response => setArticleData(response.data)) },[]) return( <>
